data.title: Xero Beautiful Business Fund
data.meta_description: See all the Xero Beautiful Business Fund global and regional winners who are receiving  funding to help build a better future for their business.
data.text:
Weâre backing beautiful business

The Xero Beautiful Business Fund is an initiative backing you for the future. Weâre offering over US$460,000 in funding to Xero small business customers in Australia, Canada (excluding Quebec), New Zealand, Singapore, South Africa, the UK, and the US, so you can keep doing what you do best.

Enter now

Country and global prizes

There will be four winners from each country, each receiving US$12,500. Four global winners will be selected from the pool of country winners from around the world. Those global winners will get an additional US$30,000.

Learn more about the prizes

Download our partner toolkit

For accountants and bookkeepers, weâve created a toolkit that includes a range of assets, from email headers to templates, for you to send to your clients about the Xero Beautiful Business Fund.

Download partner toolkit

Learn more about our partner incentives

Weâre introducing a referral program for Xero accounting and bookkeeping partners. When your small business clients enter the fund, they will be asked if they were referred. If they were, they can name their accountant or bookkeeper and their firm in the application. Prizes up for grabs!

Terms apply

Meet the 2023 winners

Looking for ideas on how you can take the next step in your business?

Get to know the 2023 winners
